Serialized Form

Package dca.gui

Class dca.gui.AppClock extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 1L

Serialized Fields

runner

java.lang.Thread runner
This is the main thread for the redraw and recalculation of the date.

time

java.lang.String time
This variable stores the date as a String and can be returned.

Class dca.gui.AppInterface extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 1L

Serialized Fields

gridbag

java.awt.GridBagLayout gridbag
This is the grid bag layout used by this JPanel.

windowButtons

AppWindowControl windowButtons
This is an instance of the JPanel holding the window control components. It will appear in the top right corner of the application.

currentTime

AppClock currentTime
This is an instance of the JPanel containing the redrawn clock. This shares its location with the result bar in the bottom right.

submit

javax.swing.JButton submit
This is a button used to trigger a submission event that causes the DayCounter to calculate the difference of days. It appears on the very right.

toLabel

javax.swing.JButton toLabel
This is a button labeled for the second date, and will display the second date as text. It appears below the fromLabel button on the left.

fromLabel

javax.swing.JButton fromLabel
This is a button labeled for the first date, and will display the first date as text. It appears above the toLabel button on the left.

currentTimeLabel

javax.swing.JButton currentTimeLabel
This is a button labeled as "Current Time", and triggers the display of the clock component. This component is near the top on the left column.

yearLabel

javax.swing.JButton yearLabel
A button that displays the current year.

monthLabel

javax.swing.JButton monthLabel
A button that displays the current month.

dayLabel

javax.swing.JButton dayLabel
A button that displays the current day and day of the week.

title

javax.swing.JLabel title
This is a label that shows the name of the program.

resultLabel

javax.swing.JButton resultLabel
A button that clears the result display.

result

javax.swing.JTextField result
A JTextField that displays the results.

monthBox1

javax.swing.JComboBox monthBox1
This is a JCombobox for the first date.

monthBox2

javax.swing.JComboBox monthBox2
This is a JCombobox for the second date.

yearBox1

javax.swing.JComboBox yearBox1
This is a JCombobox for the first date.

yearBox2

javax.swing.JComboBox yearBox2
This is a JCombobox for the second date.

dayBox1

javax.swing.JComboBox dayBox1
This is a JCombobox for the first date.

dayBox2

javax.swing.JComboBox dayBox2
This is a JCombobox for the second date.

Class dca.gui.AppWindow extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

data

DayCounterData data
This is the DayCounter calling sub-class.

panel

AppInterface panel
An AppInterface JPanel.

container

javax.swing.JPanel container
A panel that contains the AppInterface.

date

java.util.Date date
Used to calculate the current Date.

initialClick

java.awt.Point initialClick
Used to calculate drag distance.

monthNames

java.lang.String[] monthNames
Stores the names of month 1 and month 2.

date1

int[] date1
Stores the day, month, and year of date 1.

date2

int[] date2
Stores the day, month, and year of date 2.

currentDate

int[] currentDate
Stores the day, month, and year of the current date.

currentString

java.lang.String[] currentString
A String array that stores the month name, the ay of the week, and the date line.

timeShown

java.lang.Boolean timeShown
Whether the time display is being shown or not.

responseBuffer

java.lang.String responseBuffer
This is the String that is set as the text of the result display.

Class dca.gui.AppWindowControl extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 1L

Serialized Fields

close

javax.swing.JButton close
This button closes the window.

minimize

javax.swing.JButton minimize
This button minimizes the window, and is to the left of the close button.

grid

This is the grid layout that holds the two buttons.
